articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to State Academy of Sciences
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to State Academy of Sciences
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the State Academy of Sciences.
					 He looked round the statue of President Kim Il Sung and the monument to the teachings given by the three commanders of Mt. Paektu to the academy.
					
					 He called for erecting at the academy statues depicting smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, who trained a huge army of scientists and technicians and united them around the party as solid as a fortress, so that its scientists and technicians might always work and live, expressing their inmost feelings towards them.
					
					 He looked round the revolutionary museum of the academy.
					
					 He underscored the need for the scientists and technicians to settle issues pending solution for economic development and the improvement of the people's living standard under a long-term plan and scientific and technological issues arising in realities and go beyond the cutting edge and thus make a shortcut to the building of knowledge-based economy so as to glorify the undying exploits Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed for the nation's development of science and technology to posterity.
					
					 He spent hours to go round Manufactory No. 111, the IT Sci-Tech Institute and the Exhibition of Scientific Research Successes at the academy and learned in detail about scientific researches. 
					
					 Noting science and technology is a driving force accelerating the building of a thriving nation, he set forth important tasks to be fulfilled to develop the nation's scientific researches on a higher level as required by the developing reality.
					
					 He instructed the academy to intensify the scientific researches and apply in good time research successes in practice for giving full play to the might of the self-supporting national economy.
					
					 Underscoring the need to steadily increase the role of the scientists and technicians in order to put the national economy on a Juche-oriented, modern and scientific basis and win victory after victory in the showdown with the enemies, he said the front of science is, indeed, a forefront in the battle for protecting socialism.
					
					  In order to achieve successes in scientific researches it is necessary not to spare investment in the field of science and technology, he said, and took benevolent measures for strengthening the material and technical foundation of the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 There is nothing to spare for the scientists and technicians, precious treasures of the country, he said, adding that the party would make sure that a modern street for scientists would be built in the area of Unjong scientists where the State Academy of Sciences is situated by the party founding anniversary this year just as Unha Scientists Street was constructed last year. 
					
					 He proposed naming the new street of scientists to be built "Wuisong Scientists Street." 
					
					 He said that there is no boundary for scientists but the scientists and technicians in the DPRK have the care of the socialist country and the care of the mother party. Expressing belief that they would make positive contributions to carrying out the cause of building a rich and powerful country by accomplishing bigger scientific and technological achievements with a high ideal and dream, he had a photo session with scientists and technicians of the State Academy of Sciences. 
					
					 Right after providing field guidance to the State Academy of Sciences, he went to Lake Yonphung where a holiday home for scientists will be built. 
					
					 He was very pleased to watch the lake, saying that the beautiful lake and thick woodland around it looked fantastic, indeed, when he visited it in summer and added its scenery in winter was equally wonderful.
					
					 He stressed the need to build the world's best holiday home for scientists on the shore of Lake Yonphung so that scientists and technicians may have good rest. He personally solved all problems arising in the construction of the holiday home including designing, supply of building materials and formation of the construction forces.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Thae Bok, Han Kwang Bok, Ri Jae Il, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So and Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Japanese Lawmaker
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Gift from Japanese Lawmaker
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councillors of Japan and chief director of the Sports Peace Community Association, specified non-profit undertaking corporation of Japan, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 It was conveyed to Kim Yong Il, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is advisor to the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, by Kanji Inoki on Wednesday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets Kanji Inoki
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets Kanji Inoki
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who is advisor to the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, Wednesday met and had a talk with Kanji Inoki and his party on visit to the DPRK. Inoki is a member of the House of Councillors of Japan and chief director of Sports Peace Community Association, specified non-profit undertaking corporation of Japan.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Makes Field Survey of Construction of Dormitory of Textile Mill
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Makes Field Survey of Construction of Dormitory of Textile Mill
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the Korean People's Army, made a field survey of the construction of a dormitory of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill.
					 Soldier-builders out in the building of dormitory true to the noble intention of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un are demonstrating a-match-for-a-hundred spirit in carrying out the interior project in the wake of completing the frame project in a brief span of time.
					
					 The director acquainted himself with the building and supply of building materials.
					
					 He had discussions on measures to ensure on a high level the quality of structures on the basis of the experience in completing various construction projects at the "Masikryong speed" and introduce the heating system by use of geothermal water.
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address set it forth as an important task to build many structures for improving the living conditions of the people, the director said, calling for giving full play to the revolutionary soldier spirit once again in the building of the dormitory, true to the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: CPRK Warns U.S., S. Korean Authorities to Stop Projected Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
CPRK Warns U.S., S. Korean Authorities to Stop Projected Joint Military Exercises
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued the following statement Wednesday:
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un in his historic New Year Address clarified the principled and sincere stand to ease tension and ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula and improve the north-south relations.
					
					 The address has commanded support and aroused sympathy from all Koreans and other people around the world. The public at home and abroad are hoping the situation on the Korean Peninsula is eased and the north-south ties are improved to open a new phase for reconciliation, peace and reunification.
					
					 But ill-boding provocative remarks are heard from south Korea from the outset of the New Year and powder-reeking war exercises are being waged, vitiating the hope-filled atmosphere at the beginning of the new year.
					
					 Despite the unanimous denunciation by the public at home and abroad, it was openly announced that huge Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises will be staged for months from the end of February. This has created such a deplorable situation in which huge aggression troops of the U.S. are deployed in areas close to the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					 The projected military exercises will reportedly activate huge transport planes, landing ships, high-speed landing boats, surface-effect ship and landing armored vehicles of the U.S. and the puppet army of south Korea as well as huge marine and air war means. To be involved in the drills are ill-famed U.S. third marine task force from Okinawa which will wage the second biggest landing drill after the 1989 Team Spirit joint military exercises.
					
					 The U.S. and puppet warmongers are claiming that the purpose of the drill is to take control of nuclear facilities in the north and occupy Pyongyang in case of "emergency in the north"
					
					 This is another serious military provocation against the DPRK and an outright challenge to the good faith of the DPRK and the public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 We take special note of the fact that the announcement of the saber-rattling is timed to coincide with the new year press conference given by the chief executive of south Korea.
					
					 Outwardly, south Korea welcomed the New Year Address and said that it hopes for opening the first button through the reunions of separated families and relatives, providing a fresh occasion and shaping the framework for mending the south-north ties. But behind the scene it is planning to wage war exercises against its fellow countrymen. How can this be understood?
					
					 The prevailing situation proves that the south Korean chief executive made a lie and has an axe to grind.
					
					 The north-south ties have suffered greatly from the war drills that were repeatedly held in south Korea every year.
					
					 By straining the situation through such war drills as Key Resolve, Foal Eagle and Ulji Freedom Guardian from the outset of each year, they wasted away time, preventing anything favorable for improving the north-south ties from being achieved.
					
					 This is the history of the north-south ties.
					
					 What was gained were only escalated tension, increased danger of a war and stalemate in the north-south ties and extreme discord, antagonism and hostility between the fellow countrymen.
					
					 Such an evil cycle can never be allowed to go on any longer.
					
					 The present situation shows who truly stands for detente and peace on the Korean Peninsula and who pursues confrontation and war and who is a hypocrite, provoker standing in the way of improving the north-south relations.
					
					 The puppet forces are making extremely serious provocation like the DPRK-targeted war exercises together with outsiders. Yet, they are talking about "provocation" by someone. This is like a guilty party filing a suit first. 
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group, much upset by the disclosure of their bellicose nature and increasing voices of criticism, are claiming that those are "annual exercises for defense". But they should know that such deceptive and shameless sophism will never work on anyone.
					
					 The recent announcement of the huge DPRK-targeted war drills by the U.S. and puppet warmongers is a total denial of the improvement of the north-south ties and dialogue and is little short of the declaration of a total nuclear stand-off.
					
					 We sternly warn the U.S. and the south Korean authorities to stop the dangerous military exercises which may push the situation on the peninsula and the north-south ties to a catastrophe.
					
					 They should clearly understand that the north-south ties will plunge into a deadlock and unimaginable holocaust and that disaster will follow should they go ahead with the nuclear war drills and make military provocation, defying our warning.

articles.title: Brisk Preparations for Election of Deputies to SPA
articles.content:
Brisk Preparations for Election of Deputies to SPA
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Preparations are making brisk headway across the DPRK for the election of deputies to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly (SPA).
					 Provincial (municipal), city (district) and county committees for the election of deputies to the 13th SPA were organized according to the regulations for the enforcement of the law on electing deputies to the people's assemblies at all levels of the DPRK and started their work.
					
					 Election committees were also organized in the field of armed forces.

articles.title: Anniversary of Management Office for Revolutionary Battle Sites in Secret Camp of Mt. Paektu Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Management Office for Revolutionary Battle Sites in Secret Camp of Mt. Paektu Marked
						
Samjiyon, January 15 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held Wednesday to mark the 40th anniversary of the Management Office for Revolutionary Battle Sites in the Secret Camp of Mt. Paektu.
					 The office, inaugurated on Jan. 16, Juche 63 (1974), has successfully discharged its revolutionary duty, covering the proud path with loyalty and feats under the guidance and care of the party and leader.
					
					 A congratulatory message sent by the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to the officials, lecturers and caretakers of the office was read out at the meeting.
					
					 The message said that President Kim Il Sung personally found out the revolutionary battle sites in the secret camp of Mt. Paektu and gave field guidance to them several times to build them to be powerful centers for education in revolutionary tradition and time-honored holy places of revolution.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il guided the work to build the battle sites to make them retain their original glory on the principle of historicism and reconstruct lodging quarters of visitors and showed such great benevolence as making sure that houses for employees, schools and kindergartens were built, it noted.
					
					 It highly estimated the officials, lecturers and caretakers of the office for making achievements in preserving and glorifying the revolutionary tradition of the WPK with loyalty to the party and the leader.
					
					 A report and speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 Present there were Ri Sang Won, chief secretary of the Ryanggang Provincial Committee of the WPK, officials concerned and others.

articles.title: Preparations for This Year's Farming Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Preparations for This Year's Farming Brisk in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The agricultural workers in the DPRK are stepping up the preparations for this year's farming in hearty response to supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 Those of South Hwanghae Province carried more than one million tons of manure to fields in the first week of the year. Anak, Jaeryong and Paechon counties have made innovations in production of compost, while Sinchon county carried to fields at least 150 000 tons of compost in a few days.
					
					 South Hamgyong Province carried out a task for conveying compost at 112 percent in six days, which would take ten days in ordinary pace.
					
					 Such compost carrying assignments were performed ahead of schedule in Thosan and Sungho counties of North Hwanghae Province and Mangyongdae, Sadong and Ryokpho districts and Kangdong County of Pyongyang.
					
					 After all, millions of tons of compost were carried to farm fields throughout the country in the first week.
					
					 Meanwhile, North Phyongan Province has pushed ahead with the work to raise the fertility of soil, spreading on fields fertile soil 1.2 times as much as last year's in the same period. South Phyongan Province finished over 90 percent of the material preparations for seedbeds.
					
					 The farming preparations in the country go on smoothly thanks to the devoted efforts of the agricultural workers determined to attain the goal of grain production set by the Workers' Party of Korea for this year marking the 50th anniversary of the theses on the socialist rural question.

articles.title: Symposium in Field of Social Sciences Held
articles.content:
Symposium in Field of Social Sciences Held
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- A symposium in the field of social sciences was held on Wednesday on the occasion of the 570th anniversary of Hunminjongum (Korean alphabet) to preserve and glorify the advantages of the national language.
					 Present there were teachers, researchers, lecturers, journalists, editors and officials in the fields of science, education, preservation of national heritages, media and party cadre training institutions.
					
					 Hunminjongum created in January, 1444 is scientific in its principles and perfect in its structure and system and beautiful in its shape. It is also easy and convenient to learn and write and looks nice.  
					
					 Speakers explained that Hunminjongum is a precious cultural treasure of Kim Il Sung's nation.
					
					 Our written language is the best and peculiar one in the world which was protected through the bloody anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, they noted, and went on:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung embodied the immortal Juche idea in the field of language, founding the Juche-oriented idea and theory of language for the first time in the history and developing it in depth.
					
					 The Juche-oriented idea and theory of language founded by the President were developed on a new, higher stage under the wise guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il established the Pyongyang dialect as an example of socialist national language to suit the socialist construction progressing in all spheres and polished words of foreign origin and uncultured words to be beautiful and correct Korean language.
					
					 The immortal feats they performed in developing the national language are shining with greater brilliance under the energetic leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The speakers called for establishing a habit of cultured linguistic life.

articles.title: DPRK's Classic Still Popular among World People
articles.content:
DPRK's Classic Still Popular among World People
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Some time ago, China's newspaper Heilongjiang Xinwen introduced the Korean film "The Flower Girl".
					 The film was adapted from the revolutionary opera "The Flower Girl", written by President Kim Il Sung in Juche 19 (1930) when he was waging an anti-Japanese struggle.
					
					 This immortal classic is still winning popularity among the Chinese and other world people.
					
					 In 2008 alone, "The Flower Girl" as an opera was performed more than 20 times in 10-odd cities of China, including Shanghai, Wuhan and Tianjin, after its premiere at the State Grand Theatre in Beijing, drawing many spectators. And its additional performance was given in Beijing again to meet the strong demand of Chinese people.
					
					 Created as a masterpiece under the energetic guidance of leader Kim Jong Il, the revolutionary opera left a deep impression on peoples in Italy, France and other Western European countries, to say nothing of former socialist countries in East Europe, in the 1970s.
					
					 In 1979, the opera was performed in Paris, drawing a great number of people even from Americas. At that time mass media in France reported that the world enjoyed the performance even if it was given in Paris.

articles.title: More Meetings Held to Vow to Implement Tasks Set Forth in New Year Address
articles.content:
More Meetings Held to Vow to Implement Tasks Set Forth in New Year Address
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers and employees of institutions, factories and enterprises held meetings to vow to thoroughly carry out the important tasks set forth by Marshal Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Reports were made at the meetings to be followed by oath-taking speeches.
					
					 Reporters and speakers said that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address is the important guidelines indicating the shortcut to building a thriving socialist nation and the banner arousing all the service personnel and people to make a heroic advance.
					
					 They underscored the need to bring about a decisive turn in the agricultural production, bearing in mind the intention of the Workers' Party of Korea on keeping up agriculture as a major thrust in the drive for economic construction and improved people's living standard this year.
					
					 They underlined the need to concentrate all efforts on making full preparations for this year's farming, positively introduce the advanced farming methods and technologies, do farming in every process as required by the Juche-based farming method and thus increase the per hectare yield.
					
					 It is necessary to increase the production of rolled steel and heavy rail, bearing in their mind the responsibility for the vanguard sectors of the national economy, they said, and went on:
					
					 It is imperative to increase the level of medical technology, improve the medical treatment and preventive medicine so that the benefits of socialist healthcare system reach the people more closely.
					
					 It is necessary to go into the stirring reality to create a large number of masterpieces of the times to encourage the people to work new miracles and perform feats.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Exposes Reactionary Nature of Western-Style "Democracy"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Exposes Reactionary Nature of Western-Style "Democracy"
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Western-style "democracy" is the most reactionary and unpopular politics mercilessly trampling down the aspiration and demand of the popular masses for freedom and democracy, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 "Democracy" touted by the U.S. is the slogan for aggression and interference to realize its ambition for dominating the world, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Those keen on violating the sovereignty of other countries at random under the pretext of protecting the "freedom of individual character" are criminals who stamp out the basic right and freedom of the popular masses.
					
					 Bombs are exploding and people killed in streets almost every day in Iraq, which the U.S. is putting forward as an "example of democracy". Iraq has turned into a theatre of destruction, plunder and massacre. This goes to clearly prove the true appearance of "freedom" and "democracy" the U.S. is trying hard to impose on other countries.
					
					 The U.S. is regarding it as one of the major goals of its foreign policy to promote "freedom and democracy" in different parts of the world. It is considering that it is natural for all the members of the international community to follow its political mode. 
					
					 It is forcing other countries and nations to follow the Western-style political mode and order of life and accept them. This is nothing but a high-handed practice to deprive the people of other countries of the right of choosing idea and ism and it is also little short of denying and violating democracy itself.
					
					 The U.S. persists in imposing "color revolution" on other countries. This is aimed to create uneasiness in relevant countries, quench social harmony and, in the long run, destroy all the achievements made by the people.
					
					 To oppose Western-style "democracy" is an important issue to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the countries and nations and ensure true democracy.

articles.title: Aim Sought by Japanese Politicians in Visit to Yasukuni Shrine Disclosed
articles.content:
Aim Sought by Japanese Politicians in Visit to Yasukuni Shrine Disclosed
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Shindo, Japanese minister of Internal Affairs, after visiting Yasukuni Shrine on Jan. 1, said that he visited the shrine out of respect for the departed souls of those who lost their lives in wars and that he refreshed his desire for peace, hoping there would be no repetition of war.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary observes: It is the true intention of the Japanese reactionaries like Shindo to lead Japan again to the war of aggression overseas by consoling the departed souls of war criminals in shrine and reviving memories of Japanese militarism.
					
					 Shindo said that he hardened the resolve not to fight a war again and that he keenly felt the value of peace. His remark is no more than a deceptive rigmarole to calm down the resentment of the international community against Japan.
					
					 Lurking behind the group visit to the shrine by the "gentlemen" of political circles in Japan is the purpose to rearm the Japanese people with "militarist patriotism" by creating the atmosphere of "respecting" and idolizing militarists. In a word, this is aimed to instill into Japanese the idea that they should turn out to "retake strong Japan", regarding it as "pride" and "honor" to fall like "Sakura" (cherry) in the military aggression overseas like the war dead.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should clearly understand that overseas aggression is not the way for Japan's prosperity, the commentary says, stressing the international community will never pardon Japan coming out for a war again.

articles.title: Declaration on Situation Decries Moves for Forcible Disbandment of Opposition Party in S. Korea
articles.content:
Declaration on Situation Decries Moves for Forcible Disbandment of Opposition Party in S. Korea
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- 1 145 south Koreans dedicated a declaration on the situation to newspaper Hangyore Tuesday protesting against the puppet authorities' moves to forcibly disband the Unified Progressive Party (UPP). 
					 They blamed the authorities for cooking up a rebellion case and pressing for a motion calling for disbanding the UPP after people's candlelight actions began in protest against the power organs' illegal interference in election.
					
					 To stop the forcible disbandment of the UPP is an issue of realizing democracy of society, and an issue preventing political rights of civic and public organizations from being violated, they said.
					
					 They called on conscientious democratic forces to join hands against the forcible disbandment.
					
					 They demanded the "government" withdraw the motion calling for the disbandment of the UPP, though belatedly.
					
					 If the Park Geun Hye regime finally brings back the security rule dating back to the dictatorial period, it will face strong public resistance, they warned.

articles.title: All-People Anti-"Government" Struggle Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
All-People Anti-"Government" Struggle Called for in S. Korea
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The all-people committee to commemorate the lapse of 5 years since Ryongsan incident made up of 146 civic and social organizations of south Korea held a press conference in Ryongsan District, Seoul on Jan. 13 and pledged to wage an all-people anti-"government" struggle.
					 Speakers at the press conference accused the authorities of mobilizing police and ruthlessly killing evacuees who demanded the right to existence in Ryongsan on Jan. 20, 2009.
					
					 The present "government", however, has added to the pain of wounds of the bereaved families, the speakers said, adding:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime has paid lip-service to the great unity of people but behind the scene it appointed Kim Sok Gi, then chief of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency, who directly masterminded the killings of evacuees as president of an air service company.
					
					 The "government" let the prime mover of the tragic incident hold the post of power, far from punishing him even though the wrong development and excessive repression deprived innocent people of their lives in a minute. This amounts to the declaration of its intent to carry forward what was advocated by the Lee Myung Bak regime, the worst regime in history of the nation's division.
					
					 We can not hold only a memorial service under the harsh suppression, the speakers said, vowing to fight it out against the "government" until the truth about the incident is probed and the mastermind of the killings is punished.
					
					 They said they would hold press conference, information service, candlelight meeting and memorial service as part of the anti-"government" struggle in Seoul and in areas of Kyonggi Province till Jan. 20.

articles.title: S. Korea's Humiliating Decision to Offer Huge Funds for Upkeep of U.S. Forces Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Humiliating Decision to Offer Huge Funds for Upkeep of U.S. Forces Assailed
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea in a statement on Jan. 13 denounced the puppet authorities for their humiliating act of offering huge funds for the upkeep of the U.S. forces in south Korea.
					 At recent negotiations for the conclusion of a special agreement on sharing the expenses for the upkeep of the U.S. forces, the authorities agreed with the U.S. to increase the expenses by 5.8 percent over the last year, the statement said, adding:
					
					 At the negotiations south Korea allowed the illegal diversion of the expenses to the transfer of the base of the U.S. second division and set the term of concluding the agreement as five years, an indication of open surrender and a humiliating act of drawing on resources for the U.S.
					
					 The "government" cited U.S. budgetary shortage as a pretext but it is intolerable humiliation to allow the U.S. to replenish its budget shortage caused by economic downturn and consecutive wars of invasion with the taxes collected from south Koreans.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye regime is drawing on resources for the U.S. at will while curtailing all sorts of budgets for the people's welfare under the pretext of financial shortfall. This is little short of admitting itself its sycophantic nature.
					
					 The statement urged the "government" authorities to totally nullify the humiliating agreement and hold renegotiations.

articles.title: Senior Chongryon Official Calls for Nationwide Struggle for National Reunification
articles.content:
Senior Chongryon Official Calls for Nationwide Struggle for National Reunification
						
Tokyo, January 13 (KNS-KCNA) -- Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), on Jan. 11 issued a statement titled "We'll dynamically turn out in the nationwide struggle for making a fresh advance in national reunification movement."
					 He said that supreme leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address called for holding fast to the standpoint of By Our Nation Itself and positively struggling to defend the national security and peace and establishing a climate for improved inter-Korean ties to resolve the reunification issue of the country in keeping with the aspiration and desire of the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The New Year Address serves as an inspiring and victorious banner instilling the noble idea of national independence and the strong will into the minds of Koreans in Japan and encouraging them to turn out in the nationwide struggle for opening up a new phase of independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 Only when all Koreans in the north, in the south and overseas come out as one in the nationwide struggle along the road for reunification indicated by Kim Jong Un, can a new breakthrough be made in the struggle for national reunification.
					
					 The south Korean authorities must immediately stop soliciting foreign countries for "international cooperation" over the national issue, the inter-Korean ties and intensifying the moves for confrontation with their compatriots in the north as it may cause the outbreak of a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 They must also halt their racket to eliminate the "forces following the north" and their fascist suppression of pro-reunification democratic forces in south Korea.
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, who have taken the road of reunification under the leadership of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, will launch a strenuous struggle for realizing the national reunification with Kim Jong Un as the lodestar for national reunification.

articles.title: Mexican Party Supports Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
articles.content:
Mexican Party Supports Kim Jong Un's New Year Address
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The People's Socialist Party of Mexico on Jan. 7 made public a statement in support of the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					 The statement said that Kim Jong Un in his historic New Year Address indicated the important goal of the struggle for raising a fierce wind of a fresh leap forward on all fronts of building a thriving socialist country and gave the tasks and ways for achieving the goal. 
					
					 The statement went on: 
					
					 We are sure that the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the people of the DPRK will achieve great success in the grandiose struggle for building a socialist economic power and a highly-civilized country this year, too, under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, great strategist and statesman. 
					
					 We extend full support to the struggle of the Korean people to build a thriving nation under the great banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism. 
					
					 We also extend solidarity to the struggle of the Korean people to reject outside forces, firmly preserve the standpoint of By Korean Nation Itself and protect security and peace of the nation. 
					
					 We fully support the idea of the DPRK's foreign policy -- independence, peace and friendship -- which calls for striving to expand and develop relations of friendship and cooperation with all countries that respect its sovereignty and are friendly to it, safeguard global peace and security and promote common prosperity of mankind. 
					
					 We call upon progressive political parties, governments and organizations of the world to extend firm solidarity to the WPK and the people of the DPRK in their endeavors for prosperity of socialist Korea and independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.

articles.title: New Year Address of Kim Jong Un Supported by Nepalese Political Figure
articles.content:
New Year Address of Kim Jong Un Supported by Nepalese Political Figure
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Krishna Bahadur Mahara, organizational secretary of the Unified Communist Party of Nepal (Maoist) who is former vice prime minister of Nepal, released a statement on Jan. 3.
					 The statement noted:
					
					 We are deeply moved by the New Year Address of Marshal Kim Jong Un in which he extended high tribute and New Year greetings to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, tribute to the martyrs who dedicated their precious lives to national defence and socialist construction last year and New Year greetings to all the service personnel and people, compatriots in the south and abroad and the world progressives and other foreign friends.
					
					 We are very pleased that the Korean people powerfully demonstrated the might of Songun and bolstered up national defence capabilities in every way last year.
					
					 The Korean people will surely open up a heyday of Songun Korea by raising a fierce wind of a fresh leaping forward on all fronts of building a thriving socialist nation this year, too.
					
					 We, together with the world progressive peoples, extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just efforts to realize the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and to build a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Reported Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Reported Abroads
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address was reported by foreign media between January 2 and 10. 
					 The Nepali paper Arpan and internet homepages of the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Switzerland carried the full text of the New Year Address of Kim Jong Un together with his photo. 
					
					 The Guinean paper Horoya, Ethiopian paper Reporter, Namibian paper New Era, Czech paper Halo Noviny and a Swedish magazine posted the gist or part of the address dealing with reunification of Korea. 
					
					 Papers and magazine of Namibia, the Czech Republic and Sweden carried photos of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Disseminated Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Disseminated Abroad
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un has been studied and disseminated in many countries. 
					 Briefings and round-table talks on the address took place by the Communist Party of Tajikistan and the Association for Implementing the Juche Philosophy of Democratic Congo and at an Ethiopian hospital in the period from Jan. 4 to 7. 
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address expressed the belief that the revolutionary cause of Korea is sure to emerge victorious as the DPRK advances under the great banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism though the tasks facing the Workers' Party of Korea and people of the DPRK are gigantic and difficulties lie in their way. 
					
					 The brilliant successes achieved by the Korean people in the drive for building an economic power and improving the people's living standard last year clearly show that no one can check socialist Korea advancing, united close around Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The Korean people will surely win a final victory under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The chairman of the Association for Implementing the Juche Philosophy of Democratic Congo said:
					
					 There were many eye-opening events in the DPRK last year. The Korean people made 2013 a year of victory and glory thanks to Kim Jong Un, who is enjoying absolute support and trust from the service personnel and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 The vice-director of an Ethiopian hospital said that the DPRK opened up a heyday of construction last year and hoped that the Korean people would achieve greater successes in the drive for economic construction and improvement of people's living standard.

articles.title: Chinese Paper Introduces Korean Film
articles.content:
Chinese Paper Introduces Korean Film
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The Chinese paper Heilongjiang Xinwen introduced Korean film "The Flower Girl" on January 9.
					 "The Flower Girl" is a literary work personally created by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, the paper noted, adding:
					
					 Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK Kim Jong Il guided the work to be filmized in the 1970s.
					
					 Korean film "The Flower Girl" was screened in China, drawing huge audiences.
					
					 The film was awarded a special prize and a medal at the 18th International Film Festival. 
					
					 A citizen in China said:
					
					 I watched the film when I was studying at primary school. But I still clearly remember it. I walked long to watch the film which was on show outdoor. All the audience watched it with tears in their eyes.

articles.title: Socialism in DPRK Praised by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Socialism in DPRK Praised by Nigerian Organization
						
Pyongyang, January 15 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea posted articles introducing the DPRK on its website on Jan. 8.
					 An article titled "Social phenomena peculiar to the DPRK" noted:
					
					 There are special social phenomena drawing attentions of foreigners in the DPRK.
					
					 People do not know housing cost.
					
					 Foreigners are greatly impressed by the Changjon Street newly built in Pyongyang.
					
					 The reason is that ordinary people are owners of flats and they are utterly unaware of costs of their flats. In the West it is unimaginable for toiling masses to buy such fine houses.
					
					 Another phenomenon peculiar to the DPRK is that they pay no money to their doctors.
					
					 Those living in capitalist countries can not understand the DPRK where people have their own doctors as it is only possible for the rich in their countries.
					
					 Parents are entrusting their sons and daughters to the care of the country in the DPRK.
					
					 A law on introduction of universal compulsory 12-year education was adopted at the 6th session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK in 2012.
					
					 One should pay attention to the fact that it is free education.
					
					 Not only the compulsory education but also education at universities, post-graduate courses and other higher education institutions are also free of charge.
					
					 Doctor's fee, housing cost and taxes which are common to all the countries in the world do not exist in the DPRK as it enforces sunshine-like policies for the people.
					
					 The slogan "Everything for the people and everything by relying on them!" has been applied in all fabrics of social life in the DPRK.
					
					 Its socialist system is incomparably superior to capitalist society where jungle law prevails and money is regarded as omnipotent.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita la Academia Estatal de Ciencias
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita la Academia Estatal de Ciencias
						
Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio en el terreno las labores de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias.
					El recorrio primero la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el monumento a las instrucciones de los 3 Generales del monte Paektu, construidos en la academia.
					
					Propuso levantar en la academia las estatuas de bronce de las imagenes del sol del Presidente y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes formaron el gran contingente de cientificos y tecnicos y los agruparon como un muro en torno al partido, de modo que los cientificos y tecnicos de aqui puedan trabajar y vivir viendo siempre y conversando mentalmente con los Generalisimos.
					
					Acto seguido, recorrio el museo de la historia revolucionaria de la academia.
					
					Los cientificos y tecnicos de aqui deben glorificar para siempre las hazanas de los Generalisimos realizadas por el desarrollo cientifico-tecnico del pais, al resolver los problemas, que han de ser solucionados en el futuro para el desarrollo economico y el mejoramiento de las condiciones de la vida del pueblo, y los otros cientifico-tecnicos surgidos en la realidad y abrir el atajo de la construccion de la economia basada en la intelectualidad mediante la campana para alcanzar los niveles sofisticados, instruyo.
					
					Averiguo en detalles como marchan los trabajos de investigacion cientifica en su largo recorrido por la fabrica no. 111, el instituto de IT y la exposicion de ciencias.
					
					La ciencia y la tecnica son el motor que impulsa la construccion de un Estado prospero, dijo y presento las tareas importantes que serviran de guia en realizar en una fase mas alta la investigacion cientifica del pais conforme a la realidad en desarrollo.
					
					Dio la indicacion de profundizar la investigacion cientifica para poner en pleno juego el poderio de la economia nacional autarquica e introducir a tiempo en la realidad los exitos de estudio.
					
					Para desarrollar la economia nacional con recursos nacionales, modernizarla y asentarla sobre la base cientifica y lograr victorias sucesivas en el enfrentamiento con los enemigos, hay que mejorar el papel de los cientificos y tecnicos, apunto y agrego que el sector de ciencias es el frente avanzado en la defensa del socialismo.
					
					Diciendo que hace falta invertir mucho en la rama cientifico-tecnica para lograr exitos en su labor, tomo las medidas por fortalecer la base material y tecnica de la academia. 
					
					No hay nada que escatimar para los cientificos y tecnicos, tesoros del pais, apunto y continuo que el partido hizo construir el ano pasado la avenida de cientificos de Unha y lo hara hasta el aniversario de la fundacion del PTC de este ano en la zona cientifica de Unjong donde esta situada la Academia Estatal de Ciencias.
					
					Propuso nombrar la avenida a nacer como la de cientificos Wisong.
					
					Aunque las ciencias no tienen fronteras, los cientificos y tecnicos coreanos tienen el regazo de la patria socialista y el del partido madre, enfatizo y se fotografio junto con los cientificos y tecnicos de la academia expresando la conviccion de que ellos contribuiran al cumplimiento de la causa de construccion de una patria prospera con alto ideal y sueno y mayores exitos de su trabajo.
					
					Ese dia, en cuanto terminara la visita sobre la academia, se traslado al lago Yonphung donde se construira la casa de reposo para los cientificos.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho por el paisaje local diciendo que el lago es pintoresco tanto en el verano como en el invierno.
					
					Instruyo construir a la ribera del lago la mejor casa de reposo para los cientificos para que ellos tomen suficiente descanso y resolvio todos los problemas relacionados con la construccion, entre otros, el diseno, el suministro de materiales y la formacion de la mano de obra.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion Choe Thae Bok, Han Kwang Bok, Ri Jae Il, Pak Thae Song, Hwang Pyong So y Ma Won Chun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de Kanji Inoki
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de Kanji Inoki
						
Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio regalo que le dedicara el senador Kanji Inoki, director jefe de la Asociacion de Comunidad de Deportes y Paz, corporacion especifica sin fines de lucro de Japon, de visita en Corea.
					El visitante lo traslado el dia 15 a Kim Yong Il, secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y asesor de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Japon.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae recorre campo de construccion del albergue de Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae recorre campo de construccion del albergue de Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk
						
Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ACNC) -- El jefe de la Direccion Politica General del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, averiguo en el terreno como va la construccion del albergue de la Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang.
					Conforme al noble proposito del Comandante Supremo Kim Jong Un, los constructores militares movilizados en la obra levantaron ya la armadura del albergue e impulsan con gran entusiasmo la construccion del interior.
					
					Choe hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de ejecucion de la obra y de suministro de materiales.
					
					Discutio los remedios para asegurar la calidad de los edificios a base de las experiencias alcanzadas en otras obras concluidas mediante la campana por la creacion de la "velocidad Masikryong" y para aplicar el sistema de calefaccion geotermica.
					
					Recordando que el Comandante Supremo presento en su mensaje del Ano Nuevo como tarea importante la construccion de muchos establecimientos que contribuyan a la mejora de las condiciones de vida del pueblo, instruyo a los constructores trabajar con el espiritu revolucionario de los militares teniendo presente el proposito del partido.

articles.title: Preparativos para las elecciones de diputados
articles.content:
Preparativos para las elecciones de diputados
						
Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ACNC) -- Marchan bien en todas las localidades del pais las labores preparativas de las elecciones de diputados a la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Segun los reglamentos de ejecucion de la ley electoral de diputados a las asambleas populares a todos niveles, fueron organizados los comites electorales de las provincias (o las ciudades directamente subordinadas al centro), las ciudades (o los municipios) y los distritos que ya comenzaron a trabajar.
					
					Los mismos comites quedaron compuestos tambien en las instituciones de fuerzas armadas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela caracter reaccionario de "democracia" a manera occidental
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela caracter reaccionario de "democracia" a manera occidental
						
Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ACNC) -- La "democracia" a modo occidental es la politica  mas reaccionaria y anti-popular que pisotea cruelmente la aspiracion y la demanda de las masas populares a la libertad y la democracia.
					Asi inicia el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo divulgado el dia 15 y continua:
					
					La "democracia" de que preconiza Estados Unidos no pasa de ser una consigna de agresion e intervencion para realizar su ambicion de hegemonia  mundial.
					
					Quienes estan enloquecidos por violar a su antojo la soberania de otros paises bajo el rotulo de la "libertad de individualidad", son delincuentes que exterminan el mas gran derecho y libertad de las masas populares.
					
					En Irak divulgado por el pais norteamericano como "modelo de la democracia", estallan diariamente las bombas provocando muertes. Asi, Irak se ha convertido en un lugar caotico de  destruccion, saqueo y masacre, lo que demuestra el verdadero aspecto de la "libertad" y la "democracia" que EE.UU. trata de aplicar forzosamente.
					
					El pais norteamericano toma como una meta principal de la politica exterior la promocion de la "libertad y la democracia" en varias regiones del mundo. Considera que todos los miembros de la sociedad internacional deben vivir merecidamente segun el modo de politico norteamericano. Impone a otros paises y naciones seguir y aceptar el modo de politico occidental y el orden de vida, lo que significa el ejercicio de coaccion tendente a arrebatar el derecho a optar la idea y el ideal de otros pueblos y la negacion y la violacion a la democracia.
					
					El objetivo de EE.UU. que obliga obstinadamente a otros paises la "revolucion de color" reside en crear en ellos la inquietud, quebrantar la armonia social y finalmente exterminar todas las conquistas logrados por los pueblos.
					
					Luchar contra la "democracia" a modo occidental constituye hoy un importante tema que se presenta para defender la soberania y la dignidad del pais y la nacion y asegurar la autentica democracia.

articles.title: Minju Joson critica visita de Shindo al santuario Yasukuni
articles.content:
Minju Joson critica visita de Shindo al santuario Yasukuni
						
Pyongyang, 15 de enero (ACNC) -- Tras rendir homenaje el primero de enero en el santuario Yasukuni, el ministro de Asuntos Interiores de Japon, Shindo, dijo que "lo hizo con respeto a los difuntos que perdieron la vida en la guerra" y "renovo la aspiracion a la paz deseando que no se repita la guerra".
					En un comentario individual difundido hoy, el periodico Minju Joson revela que Shindo y otros reaccionarios japoneses mantienen la intencion de volver a la senda de guerras de agresion a ultramar al consolar el espiritu de los criminales de guerra sepultados en ese santuario y resucitar el fantasma del militarismo, y continua:
					
					Sin embargo, para calmar la indignada sociedad internacional, dicen palabras enganosas como pensaron otra vez en no repetir la guerra y volvieron a sentir en carne propia lo valioso que es la paz.
					
					La visita de los "caballeros" politiqueros al santuario Yasukuni persigue la meta de rearmar a su pueblo con el "patriotismo militarista" al crear el "respeto social" y el culto al militarismo.
					
					En una palabra, quieren inyectar en los habitantes japoneses la idea de "recuperar un Japon poderoso" al considerar como "gloria" y "honor" morirse en el camino de agresion militarista a ultramar.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben tener presente que esa opcion no garantizara jamas la prosperidad de su pais y la sociedad internacional nunca tolerara que ellos lancen nuevamente la guerra.
